This module implements positions.

Imports

fieldtype, fqdn

Types

Direction {.pure.} = enum
  Up = "^", Right = ">", Down = "v", Left = "<"
Child-puyo's direction seen from the axis-puyo. 
Position {.pure.} = enum
  None = "", Up0 = "1N", Up1 = "2N", Up2 = "3N", Up3 = "4N", Up4 = "5N",
  Up5 = "6N", Right0 = "12", Right1 = "23", Right2 = "34", Right3 = "45",
  Right4 = "56", Down0 = "1F", Down1 = "2F", Down2 = "3F", Down3 = "4F",
  Down4 = "5F", Down5 = "6F", Left1 = "21", Left2 = "32", Left3 = "43",
  Left4 = "54", Left5 = "65"
The location where a pair is put.

Consts

AllDoublePositions = {Position.Up0..Position.Right4}
AllPositions = {Position.Up0..Position.Left5}
